Structures

In interfaces, molecules are groups of elements that function together as a unit. For example, a form label, search input, and button atom can combine them together to form a search form molecule.

Modals

Modal template.

Filter Panel

Filter sidebar.

chevron_left FILTER
Refine by Category Personnaliser
Categories Catégories clear filters
  • International Education Internationale Education 
<div id="slideout" style="left: 0px;">
	<div id="containclickme">
		<div class="toggleFilter material-icons" id="click" ng-click="ToggleSideFilters()" style="display: none;">
			<i class="material-icons">chevron_left</i>
			<span class="filterTitle">FILTER</span>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="leftContent">
		<div class="slide-out-div">
			<div class="persona-dd">
				<span class="languageItem English" style="display: block;">Refine by Category</span>
				<span class="languageItem French" style="display: none;">Personnaliser</span>
				<select class="personaList ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid" ng-model="searchFilter.Persona" ng-disabled="!filterToggle" ng-options="persona.Name as (persona.DisplayName + &quot; (&quot; + persona.Count  + &quot;)&quot;) for persona in personaList" ng-change="TogglePersona()">
					<option value="0" selected="selected" label="Everyone (6)">Everyone (6)</option>
					<option value="1" label="Parent (3)">Parent (3)</option>
					<option value="2" label="Student (1)">Student (1)</option>
					<option value="3" label="Teacher (1)">Teacher (1)</option>
					<option value="4" label="School Administrator (3)">School Administrator (3)</option>
				</select>
			</div>
			<span class="languageItem English" style="display: block;">Categories</span>
			<span class="languageItem French" style="display: none;">Catégories</span>
			<span class="clear-filters"><a href="javascript:void(0)" ng-click="ClearCategoryFilter()">clear filters</a></span>
			<div class="filterCategories">
				<ul class="categories">

					<li class="toggleBtn ng-scope">
						<span class="category-title">
                    <span ng-show="searchFilter.Language == 'English'" class="ng-binding">International Education</span>
						<span ng-show="searchFilter.Language == 'French'" class="ng-binding ng-hide">Internationale Education</span>
						</span>
						<div class="toggle">
							<div class="onoffswitch">

								<label class="mdl-checkbox mdl-js-checkbox mdl-js-ripple-effect mdl-js-ripple-effect--ignore-events is-upgraded">
									<input type="checkbox" id="category_International Education" class="mdl-checkbox__input" ng-checked="isCategorySelected()">
									<span class="mdl-checkbox__focus-helper"></span>
									<span class="mdl-checkbox__box-outline">
                          <span class="mdl-checkbox__tick-outline"></span>
									</span>
									<span class="mdl-checkbox__ripple-container mdl-js-ripple-effect mdl-ripple--center" data-upgraded=",MaterialRipple">
                          <span class="mdl-ripple is-animating" style="width: 103.823px; height: 103.823px; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) translate(18px, 18px);"></span>
									</span>
								</label>
							</div>
						</div>
					</li>
					<!-- end ngRepeat: category in categoryList -->
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Homepage

Homepage sidebar component.

Minister David Eggen Ministre David Eggen

View All Afficher Tout
News

Bulletin Two

The Government of Alberta has introduced an amendment to the Public Education Collective Bargaining Act to ensure school boards will be involved in each stage of the bargaining process. December 08, 2015

Bulletin Three - Priority

The Government of Alberta has introduced an amendment to the Public Education Collective Bargaining Act to ensure school boards will be involved in each stage of the bargaining process. December 08, 2015

Bulletin Four

The Government of Alberta has introduced an amendment to the Public Education Collective Bargaining Act to ensure school boards will be involved in each stage of the bargaining process. December 08, 2015

As good as it gets

The Government of Alberta has introduced an amendment to the Public Education Collective Bargaining Act to ensure school boards will be involved in each stage of the bargaining process. December 08, 2015
